channel.title: Xrdp on credibleDEV
channel.description: Recent content in Xrdp on credibleDEV

item.title: Setup XRDP on a Fedora VM for Remote Desktop
item.description: This guide walks you through how to set up XRDP on Fedora 37 and use Remmina for the remote desktop connection from Linux.

item.title: XRDP and VNC: Which is the Better Remote Desktop
item.description: XRDP and VNC are both popular remote desktop protocols that allow users to remotely connect to and control a computer from a different device.
